title: Google is expanding in Sub-Saharan Africa! Let's work together.
description:
Google has several openings in Sub-Saharan Africa, in the areas of Business Development, Marketing, and Business Operations and Strategy.  To learn more about available positions and to apply online, please go to:

http://www.google.com/intl/en/jobs/africa/#src=campusapp

The closing date for applications is April 1, 2011.  Applications received after this date may be considered in future selection rounds.
